text: "Signed, Sealed, Delivered, I'm Yours" is a 1970 song by Stevie Wonder. It was taken from his 12th studio album Signed, Sealed & Delivered. It went to number 3 in the United States, number 11 in the United Kingdom and number 19 in Canada. ==Peter Frampton cover== In 1977 Peter Frampton recorded a cover for his fifth studio album I'm in You. It went to number 13 in Canada and the United States. ==Blue version== In 2003 British boy band Blue recorded a version of Signed, Sealed, Delivered (I'm Yours) with Stevie Wonder and Angie Stone for their third studio album Guilty. It went to number 11 in the United Kingdom, the Netherlands and Italy. It charted the highest in Denmark where it peaked at #7. == References == Category:1970 songs Category:Soul songs Category:Stevie Wonder songs Category:Blue (group) songs Category:Ronan Keating songs Category:Kim Wilde songs Category:Peter Frampton songs Category:Jimmy Barnes songs
title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered, I'm Yours
